text: A total of 53 passengers travelling in a mini bus suffered injuries when the vehicle skidded and fell into a channel near Keezhvelur in Nagapattinam district on Tuesday. Police said the mini-bus was proceeding from Aaymazhai to Nagapattinam carrying 60 passengers. When the vehicle was nearing Ponveli village, the driver lost control of the bus while trying to avoid hitting a moped and in the process the bus tumbled into the roadside channel. – Special Correspondent
title: Mini bus rolls into channel, 53 hurt
